channel.title: [PI]Untradeables on Death[PI]
channel.description: Well my players on my server keep getting thier untradeables blocked by magers and it happens 24.7 and they come crying to me, how do I make untradeables stay equipped/in your inventory upon death?

item.title: [PI]Untradeables on Death[PI]
item.dc:creator: @cardguydude cardguydude
item.description:
@cardguydude wrote:

I would guess this, in playerassistant class.

if (c.isSkulled || !c.isSkulled) {
c.getItems().keepitem(Config.ITEM_TRADEABLE, true);
}

That might help a little. I guessed on what it would be, but maybe it will give you some ideas.

Read full topic
